name: Almost Happy
overview: A locally famous radio host has to deal with his ex-wife, who he still loves, and his two children.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Sebastián leverages tickets to a Paul McCartney concert to flirt with a young secretary. But it's his ex-wife, Pilar, who still has him intrigued.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A comedy gig that Sebastián doesn't really want to do conflicts with a big soccer game, and the decision about what to do is full of significance.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sebastián runs into his high school girlfriend after 30 years, and she's still holding a grudge because he kept their relationship a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: An old friend wants Sebastián to do a monologue at her elderly father's birthday gala. A reluctant Sebastián agrees, with baleful consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: When Sebastián learns about a friend's separation, he remembers years back when his ex, Pilar, tried to get him to break their intimate routines.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Sebastián's ineptness with the children threatens to upend a much needed day off for Pilar to try new things.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: When Gastón, Sebastián's brother, shows up on his way to Madrid, Sebastián feels the urge to vent about how they relate to each other.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Before he leaves for Madrid, Gastón resists seeing family and insists he and Sebastián party together, even after his recent medical incident.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: As Sebastián realizes he never wanted to separate from Pilar, she calls him urgently. But what she has to say is the last thing Sebastián expects.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Sebastián seems to be getting hit from all sides at once, but he'll have to make the decision on what might be the biggest potential change of all.
